title: Cowbell!
description: Put a cowbell in your pocket with this awesome app!!! ★ Want to play some tunes? ★ Annoy people? ★ Or just trick them into thinking there is a cow behind them?? Then get this app! Comes with 4 different types of Cowbell sounds!!! Just click the bell or shake your device to play the bell! Get it now! Also click "BrennanMoyMedia" above for some more fun apps! ★ Self contained app, no internet connection is required to annoy people! ★ DISCLAIMER: This app is a novelty app, like for fun, to mess with your friends and family. Please do not use it to harass and terrorize people! Also it is advised that you do not connect it to an external speaker device (or if you do keep it low). If you blast some of these noises really loudly, as with any sound, you could really damage your hearing! Don't be an idiot, and don't hurt yourself or others. BrennanMoyMedia assumes no responsibility to damage you cause yourself, others, or to property! ★ We warned you, don't be a moron! ★ Thanks and have fun with it!
